text: This is a list of diseases of foliage plants belonging to the family Polypodiaceae. ==Plant Species== {| class="wikitable" style="clear" ! colspan=3| Plant species |- |Code ||Scientifice Name ||Common Name |- |A ||Asplenium nidus ||bird's nest fern |- |N ||Nephrolepis exaltata ||Boston fern |- |Pl ||Platycerium spp. ||staghorn fern |- |Pt ||Pteris spp. ||table fern |- |} ==Bacterial diseases== {| class="wikitable" style="clear" ! colspan=3| Bacterial diseases |- |Common name ||Scientific name ||Plants affected |- |Bacterial blight ||Pseudomonas cichorii ||A, Pl |- |Bacterial blight ||Pseudomonas asplenii ||A, Pl |- |Bacterial blight ||Burkholderia gladioli ||A, D, Pl, Pt |- |} ==Fungal diseases== {| class="wikitable" style="clear" ! colspan=3| Fungal diseases |- |Common name ||Scientific name ||Plants affected |- |Gray mold ||Botrytis cinerea ||D, N, Pt |- |Rhizoctonia aerial blight ||Rhizoctonia solani ||D, N, Pl, Pt |- |} ==Nematodes, parasitic== {| class="wikitable" style="clear" ! colspan=3| Nematodes, parasitic |- |Common name ||Scientific name ||Plants affected |- |Foliar nematodes ||Aphelenchoides fragariae ||A, N |- |Lesion nematode ||Pratylenchus spp. ||N |- |} ==References== *Common Names of Diseases, The American Phytopathological Society Foliage plant (Polypodiaceae)
title: List of foliage plant diseases (Polypodiaceae)
